japanese:
うーえすーぎさーん！
こんにちはー！
translation:
Ueeesugiii-saaan!
Hellooo!

japanese: （この声は……）
translation: (That voice...)

japanese:
やっぱり四葉か。
よう、久しぶりだな。
translation:
It's got to be Yotsuba.
Yo, long time no see.

japanese:
どーもです！
上杉さんはお出かけですか？
translation:
Hiya, there!
Are you going out, Uesugi-san?

japanese: ああ、ちょっと用事をすませてきたところだ。
translation: Yeah, I was just finishing up some errands.

japanese: 暑い中、お疲れさまです。
translation: While it's this hot? Good job.

japanese:
あ、そうだ、ちょうどいい。
四葉、アイス食わないか？
translation:
Good timing.
Yotsuba, wanna get some ice cream?

japanese: へっ？　今からですか？
translation: Huh? Right now?

japanese:
今日も暑くてかなわないだろ？
ちょっと涼をとりたい気分なんだ。
俺が奢ってやる。
translation:
It's really hot today, isn't it?
I feel like eating some ice cream would be perfect. 
Let me treat you today.

japanese:
そんな、私だけなんて。
……みんなに悪いです。
translation:
Just me? I can't if it's only me.
...Everyone else would be mad at me.

japanese:
あのな、ここであいつらのことまで
気にしなくてもいいだろ。
translation: Look, you don't have to worry about the others.

japanese: でも……。
translation: But...

japanese: じゃあ……。
translation: Okay then...

japanese:
あのときは俺もお前の世話になったからな。
お礼くらいさせてくれ。
それならいいか？
translation:
Besides, I owe you for helping me out last time.
Let me treat you as thanks. How about that?

japanese: そういうことなら……お付き合いします！
translation: If you say that...then I'll go with you!

japanese:
ん～！
このアイス、すっごく美味しいです！
translation:
Mmm!
This ice cream is so delicious!

japanese:
そうなのか？
俺は普通って感じだが。
translation:
Is it?
It seems pretty normal to me.

japanese:
えー？　チョコもとっても濃厚で、
でも舌触りはなめらかで……。
これ以上のアイスはなかなかないですよ？
translation:
Huh? The chocolate is really rich,
and the texture is smooth...
Ice cream can't get much better than this!

japanese: 上杉さんは、ホント味おんちですよね。
translation: Uesugi-san, you really have no sense of taste.

japanese: まあ、お前が美味いってんならそれで充分だ。
translation:
Well, if you think it's delicious,
that's good enough for me.

japanese:
はい、食べちゃうのがもったいないくらい
美味しいです。
translation:
Yes, it's so good
that it's almost a waste to eat it.

japanese:
いや、そこはちゃんと食べてくれ！
割といい値段なんだぞ！？
translation:
No, no, make sure you eat it all!
It was quite expensive, ya know?!

japanese:
あのう、上杉さん……。
奢ってもらっておいてこう言うのはなんですが、
お財布は大丈夫なんですか？
translation:
Um, Uesugi-san...
I don't want to say this after you treated me,
but are you okay financially?

japanese: ああ、臨時収入があったからな。
translation: Yeah, I had a temporary income boost.

japanese: 臨時収入……？
translation: Temporary income...?

japanese:
ほら、島に閉じ込められてた間も、
ちゃんとお前たちに勉強を教えてただろ？
translation:
Hey, even when we were trapped on the island,
I was still teaching you all, right?

japanese:
こっちに戻ってきたときに、
一花がそれを親父さんに報告してくれたんだよ。
その分だ。
translation:
Ichika reported it to your father, when we got back.
That was my income source.

japanese:
あ～、なるほど。
それでやっと納得がいきました。
translation:
Ah, I see.
Now I finally get it.

japanese: 何が？
translation: What?

japanese:
普段通りの生活を心がけるべきだ！
普段通りに勉強をすることに意味がある！
なによりも、継続しないと学力が下がる！
translation:
We should continue with our daily lives and studying 
every day makes sense too. And if you don't study,
your academic prowess will decline!

japanese:
なーんて言ってたのは、
この臨時収入のためだったんですね？
translation: You said all that just to get paid?

japanese:
いや、違うぞ！？
あのときは本当にそう思ってたんだからな！
translation:
No, that's not true!
At the time, 
I truly thought it was the best course of action!

japanese:
あはは、そんなに慌てなくても大丈夫ですよ。
ちゃんとわかってますから。
translation:
Ahaha, you don't have to be so flustered.
I get it.

japanese:
ったく……。
それより、こっちに戻ってからも
しっかりと勉強してるんだろうな？
translation:
Good grief...
Anyway, have you been studying properly
since we came back here?

japanese:
もちろんですよ。
頭がリセットされたら困っちゃいますからね。
ちゃんと、みんなで勉強会してます。
translation:
Of course.
If I forgot what we learned, it would be a problem.
We're studying together all the time.

japanese:
姉妹で勉強会か、偉いじゃないか。
最初の頃からは考えられない進歩だ。
translation:
You guys having a study session is impressive.
I couldn't have imagined that kind of progress
in the beginning.

japanese: 最初の頃は散々でしたもんね～。
translation: We weren't a team at first, right...

japanese:
そういえば……お前だけは、
最初から勉強会に参加してくれたよな。
translation:
Speaking of which... You're the only one
who participated in the study sessions
from the very beginning, right?

japanese: 私は、最初から上杉さんの味方ですよ？
translation:
I've been standing by your side from the very start, 
Uesugi-san.

japanese:
そう、それだよ。
結局、聞きそびれたままだったが、
なんでお前は俺の味方をしてくれたんだ？
translation:
Yeah, that's right. In the end, I missed my chance to 
ask you, but why did you stand by my side?

japanese: なんでって、そんなの決まってるじゃないですか。
translation: Why? That's obvious, isn't it?

japanese:
ああ、言っておくが、あのときみたいな
嘘は通じないからな？
translation: Oh, just so you know, lies won't work anymore.

japanese: あのとき？
translation: What kinda lies?

japanese:
……三玖がコロッケを作りまくって、
俺が倒れたときだ。
translation:
...Like when Miku made a ton of croquettes,
and I collapsed.

japanese: ……四葉？
translation: ...Yotsuba?

japanese: 嘘じゃなかったのに。
translation: Even though it wasn't a lie.

japanese: はっ！？
translation: WHA?!

japanese:
（ちょ、ちょっと待て。
　あのときの四葉は……俺が好きだからと……）
translation:
(H-hold on.
 When that happened... 
 Yotsuba said she liked me, so...)

japanese:
ししし。
ひっかかりましたね？
translation:
Hee-hee-hee.
Gotcha!

japanese: なっ！！　お前、またかよ！
translation: WHA!! You did it again?!

japanese:
ふふーん、上杉さんを二度もだませるなんて、
私もかなりできる子ですね！
translation:
Heheh, I'm pretty good
to be able to deceive you twice, Uesugi-san.

japanese:
何ができる子だよ……。
お前ってやつは、まったく……。
translation:
What do you mean, you're pretty good...
You are really just too much, geez...

japanese:
どうですか？　どうですか？
私の演技にドキドキしちゃいました？
translation:
How was it? How was my performance?
Was your heart pounding cause of it?

japanese: してねーし！！
translation: It WASN'T!!

japanese:
（くそっ！　一瞬、信じちまったじゃねぇか。
　でも、まさか……だよな？）
translation:
(Damn! I believed her, just for a second.
 But, it can't be real...right?)
